ejapa nayaka agamathi ranil wikramasinha kisindu aakarayakin sajith premadasata ejapa janadhipathi apekshakathwaya laba nodenu athayi dadi wishwasayakin katayuthu kala basil rajapaksha, ee nisama gotabayata kisindu abhiyogayak nathayi upakalpanaya kara dinesh gunawardhana, wimal wirawansha, udaya gammanpila ha wasudewa nanayakkara wani eekabaddha wipakshaye nayakayin ha owunge paksha methek nosalaka harimin sitiyeya.

thawath wiwidha amathara wiyadam sandaha rupiyal ata lakshayakata adhika mudalak da washayen sampurna wiyadama rupiyal dekoti haththahaya laksha dahathara dahas harasiya hathalihaka mudalak mese aya kara thibe. me uthsawaye sanskruthika anga wenuwen edinama rupiyal ekkoti dahanawa laksha panas hathara dahasak gewa atha. 2014 sapthambar 17 dina rupiyal ekkoti panas haya laksha hayasiya hatak da gewa athi bawa warthawalin sandahan weyi.
